Uses of Package
capitalism.controller

  • Packages that use capitalism.controller 
    Package Description
    capitalism.controller  
    capitalism.controller.command  
    capitalism.model  
  • Classes in capitalism.controller used by capitalism.controller 
    Class and Description
    Parameters 
    Parameters.FULL_PRICING 
    Parameters.LABOUR_RESPONSE
    Determines how the supply of labour power responds to demand a primitive response function to be expanded and hopefully user-customized if FLEXIBLE, labour power will expand to meet demand (reserve army) if FIXED, labour power cannot expand to meet demand and provides a supply constraint on output
    Parameters.MELT_RESPONSE
    Determines whether the MELT is constant, or adjusts to the prices when these are set externally
    Parameters.PRICE_RESPONSE 
  • Classes in capitalism.controller used by capitalism.controller.command 
    Class and Description
    Parameters 
    Parameters.LABOUR_RESPONSE
    Determines how the supply of labour power responds to demand a primitive response function to be expanded and hopefully user-customized if FLEXIBLE, labour power will expand to meet demand (reserve army) if FIXED, labour power cannot expand to meet demand and provides a supply constraint on output
    Simulation 
  • Classes in capitalism.controller used by capitalism.model 
    Class and Description
    Parameters.LABOUR_RESPONSE
    Determines how the supply of labour power responds to demand a primitive response function to be expanded and hopefully user-customized if FLEXIBLE, labour power will expand to meet demand (reserve army) if FIXED, labour power cannot expand to meet demand and provides a supply constraint on output

    Determines whether the MELT is constant, or adjusts to the prices when these are set externally
